meanings.definition: The act of coming into possession of a right, title, or office.
meanings.sent1: Her accession to the throne was celebrated with great joy.
meanings.sent2: The new employee's accession to the company brought fresh ideas.
meanings.sent3: The cat's accession to the top of the bookshelf was met with surprise.
meanings.sent4: His sudden accession to power caught everyone off guard.
meanings.sent5: The queen's accession to power marked a new era for the kingdom.

meanings.definition: The act of joining a group or organization.
meanings.sent1: His accession to the club was met with warm welcomes.
meanings.sent2: The team celebrated the new player's accession with a party.
meanings.sent3: The penguin's accession to the polar bear club was unexpected.
meanings.sent4: Her accession to the student council brought fresh perspectives.
meanings.sent5: The company's accession to the industry association opened up new opportunities.

meanings.definition: The process of adding an item to a collection or archive.
meanings.sent1: The museum's accession of the ancient artifact was a significant event.
meanings.sent2: The librarian oversaw the accession of new books into the library.
meanings.sent3: The robot's accession of random items into its collection was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The archive's accession of historical documents enriched its collection.
meanings.sent5: The gallery's accession of the famous painting drew in many visitors.
